content.content: Hi all! I am providing the community an update on the HVBank status and plan moving forward. I’ve been working with @williamr , @christiancdpetersen , and @g_dip to determine our next steps. As the facilitator of the RWF core unit, @williamr is going to take the lead to complete the HVBank onboarding. This includes the coordination and legal aspects. @g_dip is managing the client relationship with HVBank. @collateral-core-unit will continue to manage the process and ensuring the deliverables are completed in a timely manner. We currently have the following tasks and work in progress:  Knowledge transfer including documentation from Christian to Will’s legal counsel (Christian/Will/new Legal) Ensure MakerDAO receives the second Genesis payment of 25M Dai (Will) Update the trust documents (Will/new Legal) Find/onboard a new broker (Greg/Will) Update the legal documentation for services provided by the new broker (Will/new Legal) Technical modifications, if needed (CES) Complete the remaining transfers (All)  If you have any questions on the individual tasks, please @mention the responsible parties as listed in the parentheses. CES will be providing ongoing updates. We look forward to a timely resolution of the HVBank onboarding.
Can you provide if and how the RWA Foundation will be added and managed through MIP58 RWA Foundations?

As a follow-on update from @monkey.irish above - RWA Foundation and Genesis Global Trading executed an amendment to the RWA Foundation/Genesis letter agreement – as approved by MKR holders Here. As with the original letter agreement, @collateral-core-unit will maintain a copy of the executed amendment.
If there is additional work to do here, we’ll ensure it happens. It’s in discussion now.
